titleStmt.title: The second set of madrigales to 3. 4. 5. and 6. parts apt both for voyals [sic] and voyces. Newly composed by Iohn Wilbye. 1609.
Madrigals, voices (3-6), set 2
titleStmt.author: Wilbye, John, 1574-1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Este alias Snodham, for Iohn Browne, and are to be sould at his shop in S. Dunstones Churchyard in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Six partbooks. At head of title, part 1: "Cantus."; part 2: "Altus."; part 3: "Tenor."; part 4: "Bassus."; part 5: "Quintus."; part 6: "Sextus.".
Signatures: [A]² B-F⁴; [A]² B-F⁴; [A]² B-E⁴; [A]² B-F⁴; [A]² B-D⁴; [A]² B-C⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop in S. Dunstones Churchyard in Fleetstreet
